action.action-desc: Ms. Van Duyne introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Small Business

form.official-title: To prohibit participation of persons convicted of certain felonies in programs of the Small Business Administration, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Stop Funding Rioters Act.

section.header: Persons convicted of certain felonies ineligible for Small Business Administration assistance
section.text: No person convicted of an offense relating to a misdemeanor or felony assault of a law enforcement officer, or convicted of a felony for actions during or in connection with a riot that resulted in the destruction of a small business concern (as defined in section 3 of the Small Business Act (15 U.S.C. 632)), shall be eligible to receive any assistance from or through, or participate in, any program administered by the Small Business Administration.
